params.name: rpc_origins
params.description: an array of rpc origin urls, if rpc is enabled

params.name: bot_public
params.description: when false only app owner can join the app's bot to guilds

params.name: bot_require_code_grant
params.description: when true the app's bot will only join upon completion of the full oauth2 code grant flow

params.name: terms_of_service_url
params.description: the url of the app's terms of service

params.name: privacy_policy_url
params.description: the url of the app's privacy policy

params.name: owner
params.description: partial user object containing info on the owner of the application

params.name: summary
params.description: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the summary field for the store page of its primary sku

params.name: verify_key
params.description: the hex encoded key for verification in interactions and the GameSDK's [GetTicket](#DOCS_GAME_SDK_APPLICATIONS/getticket)

params.name: team
params.description: if the application belongs to a team, this will be a list of the members of that team

params.name: guild_id
params.description: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the guild to which it has been linked

params.name: primary_sku_id
params.description: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the id of the "Game SKU" that is created, if exists

params.name: slug
params.description: if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the URL slug that links to the store page

params.name: cover_image
params.description: the application's default rich presence invite [cover image hash](#DOCS_REFERENCE/image-formatting)
